entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
